mapper.select: select com_no as comNo, com_category as comCategory, c.member_no as memberNo, m.member_nick as memberNick, com_title as comTitle, com_content as comContent, advantage, weakness, read_count as readCount, com_date as comDate, com_like as comLike, com_filename as comFilename, com_filepath as comFilepath from community_tbl c, member_tbl m where c.member_no = m.member_no
